participant_1.name: Emma Johnson
participant_1.personality: Warm and friendly, she enjoys connecting with others and has a nurturing demeanor.
participant_1.background: Emma has a background in psychology and often uses her understanding of human emotions to relate to her friends.

participant_2.name: Liam Smith
participant_2.personality: Charismatic and witty, he loves to engage in lively conversations and has a great sense of humor.
participant_2.background: Liam comes from a tech background and is passionate about innovation and creativity in his work.
